pred_ans_conf_MCQ: Average global temperature has been rising for the past several decades.
pred_ans_conf_NL_MCQ: The average global temperature has been rising over the past several decades
pred_ans_conf_OE: Average global temperature has been rising for the past several decades.
pred_diverse_ans: The average global temperature has been increasing over the past few decades.

Sure! The global average temperature has been rising over the past few decades, with the last decade (2010-2019) being the warmest on record. According to NASA, the global average temperature has increased by about 1.8 degrees Fahrenheit (0.94 degrees Celsius) since the late 1800s.
The average temperature worldwide has increased by approximately 1.1°C (2°F) since the late 1800s.
The global average temperature has been increasing over the past several decades.

The average global temperature has been fluctuating over the past decades, with a slight upward trend.
The trend of the world's average temperature over the past number of decades has been a steady increase.
